short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time with auto-refresh, one-click emails, and load repost tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your dispatch workflow with LoadLine. Our Chrome Extension eliminates repetitive tasks:

Auto-refresh loadboards to spot new opportunities instantly
Send broker emails with one click and track when they're read
Access broker info and ratings at a glance
Track load reposts to identify fresh opportunities
Save hours daily with automated refreshing

Perfect for dispatchers who want to boost productivity and focus on what matters most.
